title: Did the Palestinians dance at the United Nations after Niki Haile threatened to cut off aid?
subtitle: Following the decision to transfer the United States Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem, a viral video with a false allegation was published.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The video of Palestinian legislators dancing in response to Nikki Haile's threat to cut aid to the country following a controversial decision to move the United States Embassy to Jerusalem.
